data.name: Maestro VR Demo
data.detailed_description:
Maestro VR is a rhythmic music video game where you become an orchestra conductor in Virtual Reality. Use the movements of your hands to lead the orchestra playing musical works by the greatest composers in history. Unique experience where you will lead the musicians in a concert hall.

Features



  • Become a conductor in virtual reality.

  • Use your hands to keep the beat, dynamics, nuance, ensure correct entries by ensemble members.

  • Symphony Orchestra positioned in 3D spatialized sound.

  • Get experience points and ranks

  • Unlock Batons with skills. (not available in demo)

  • Conduct musical pieces from different eras.

  • Customizable Symphony Orchestra. (not available in demo)

  • Create, play and share your custom musical pieces. (not available in demo)

  • Join online as Audience. (not available in demo)

data.short_description: Maestro VR is a rhythmic music video game where you become an orchestra conductor in Virtual Reality. Feel the unique experience of conducting a symphony orchestra.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
